attributes.action: Call for an independent public enquiry it to Covid advice given to Government.
attributes.additional_details: Considering the amount of conflicting scientific information available from around the world in regards to Covid-19, an independent public investigation is necessary to ensure that the advice that the government has followed throughout this crisis has lead to the right decisions being made, as this petition will show that many believe it has not.
attributes.background: A public investigation into what advice has been given to the government in regards to Covid-19 and whether or not that information given was validated or compared with other sources of information available.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331877
